title: Turn Left Turn Right
overview: Turn Left Turn Right shows the story of two people living in adjoining apartments - one a violinist, another a writer who are perfect for each other. Although they have passed by each other in many times, they have not really noticed each other. One day fate makes them meet and they become close to each other in that one day. But fate again plays a trick on them making them part leaving them lonely and yearning for each other.
